verses.verse: Now when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H954>delayed<s%> to <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6965>"Come,<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> us a <S%H430>god<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us; as for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> we do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> of him."

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H6561>"Tear<s%> <S%H6561>off<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5141>rings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of your <S%H802>wives,<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> [them] to me."

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6561>tore<s%> <S%H6561>off<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5141>rings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in their <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> [them] to <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H428>[this<s%>] from their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H9476>fashioned<s%> it with a <S%H2747>graving<s%> <S%H2747>tool,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> it into a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is your <S%H430>god,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

Now when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [this,] he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7121>made<s%> a <S%H7121>proclamation<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow<s%> [shall be] a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

So the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> they <S%H7965>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H5066>brought<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H6925>rose<s%> up to <S%H6711>play.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H1980>down<s%> <S%H3381><s%> at <S%H3381>once,<s%> for your <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H5927>brought<s%> up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> [themselves.]

"They have <S%H4118>quickly<s%> <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them. They have <S%H6213>made<s%> for themselves a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf,<s%> and have <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> it, and have <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to it, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>'This<s%> is your <S%H430>god,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt!<s%>'"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are an <S%H7186>obstinate<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then <S%H5117>let<s%> Me <S%H5117>alone,<s%> that My <S%H639>anger<s%> may <S%H2734>burn<s%> against them, and that I may <S%H3615>destroy<s%> them; and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> of you a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H9134>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> doth Thine <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burn<s%> against Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H3318>brought<s%> out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>?

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> should the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'With <S%H9567>evil<s%> [intent] He <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out to <S%H2026>kill<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to <S%H3615>destroy<s%> them from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>'? <S%H7725>Turn<s%> from Thy <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H5162>change<s%> Thy <S%H5162>mind<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> [doing] <S%H9567>harm<s%> to Thy <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou didst <S%H7650>swear<s%> by Thyself, and didst <S%H1696>say<s%> to them, 'I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H559>spoken<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H2233>descendants,<s%> and they shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> [it] <S%H5769>forever.<s%>'"

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5162>changed<s%> His <S%H5162>mind<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> the <S%H9567>harm<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>said<s%> He would <S%H6213>do<s%> to His <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> which were <S%H3789>written<s%> on <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H5676>sides;<s%> they were <S%H3789>written<s%> on <S%H2088>one<s%> [side] and the <S%H2088>other.<s%>
And the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> were God's <S%H4639>work,<s%> and the <S%H4385>writing<s%> was God's <S%H4385>writing<s%> <S%H2801>engraved<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets.<s%>

Now when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H7452>shouted,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "There is a <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is not the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H9420>cry<s%> of <S%H1369>triumph,<s%> <S%H369>Nor<s%> is it the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H9420>cry<s%> of <S%H2476>defeat;<s%> But the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H9420>singing<s%> I <S%H8085>hear.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, as <S%H9201>soon<s%> as Moses <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> that he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> and [the] <S%H4246>dancing;<s%> and Moses' <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned,<s%> and he <S%H7993>threw<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> from his <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H7665>shattered<s%> them at the <S%H8478>foot<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H6213>made<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> [it] with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H2912>ground<s%> it to <S%H834>powder,<s%> <S%H1854><s%> and <S%H2219>scattered<s%> it <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and made the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> [it.]

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> did <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to you, that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> [such] <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin<s%> upon them?"

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do not let the <S%H639>anger<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H2734>burn;<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H859>yourself,<s%> that they are prone to <S%H9563>evil.<s%>

"For they <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6213>'Make<s%> a <S%H430>god<s%> for us <S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us; for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> we do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> of him.'

"And I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4310>'Whoever<s%> has any <S%H2091>gold,<s%> let them <S%H6561>tear<s%> it <S%H6561>off.<s%>' So they <S%H5414>gave<s%> [it] to me, and I <S%H7993>threw<s%> it into the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and out <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5695>calf.<s%>"

Now when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> were out of <S%H6544>control<s%> – for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> had let them <S%H6544>get<s%> out of <S%H6544>control<s%> to be a <S%H8103>derision<s%> among their <S%H6965>enemies<s%> –

then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Whoever<s%> is for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [come] to me!" And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together to him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H1696>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>'Every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> [of you] <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon his <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H5674>forth<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>friend,<s%> and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>'"

So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1697>instructed,<s%> and about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4390>"Dedicate<s%> <S%H3027>yourselves<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> – for <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> has been against his <S%H1121>son<s%> and against his <S%H251>brother<s%> – in order that He may <S%H5414>bestow<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon you <S%H3117>today.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "You <S%H9043>yourselves<s%> have <S%H2398>committed<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin;<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> I am <S%H5927>going<s%> up to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> I can <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H9128>sin.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>"Alas,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> has <S%H2398>committed<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin,<s%> and they have <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for themselves.

"But <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> Thou wilt, <S%H5375>forgive<s%> their <S%H9128>sin<s%> – and <S%H518>if<s%> not, <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H4229>blot<s%> me out from Thy <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H3789>written!<s%>"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4310>"Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Me, I will <S%H4229>blot<s%> him out of My <S%H5612>book.<s%>

"But <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>where<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H1696>told<s%> you. <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> My <S%H4397>angel<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; nevertheless in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H6485>punish,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H9128>sin.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5062>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> of <S%H834>what<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> had <S%H6213>made.<s%>
